entities.name: katie
entities.description: A person who touched an object that was cursed, according to Leanne.

entities.name: leanne
entities.description: A person who is arguing with Hermione and is shaken by the news about Katie.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who is comforting Leanne and trying to figure out what happened to Katie.

relationships.description: Harry Potter knows that Katie was holding the cursed object.
Leanne argued with Katie about taking the object to school.
Hermione comforted Leanne after she found out what happened to Katie.
Harry Potter is affected by the news about Katie, as he hesitates for a moment before pulling his scarf from around his neck.
